title: Binding and Finishing Processes: Theory
description: Imposition techniques, cutting and folding. Stitch, case and perfect binding techniques and applications. Operational and aesthetic uses of die cutting, scoring, creasing, foil stamping and embossing techniques. Fulfillment and mailing operations. Applications of computers to the management and technical function of binding; finishing and distribution. Credit not allowed for GRC majors. 2 lectures.
